query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_nao_lidas
FROM notifications n
LEFT JOIN notification_reads nr ON nr.notificationId = n.id AND nr.customerId = 510014
WHERE (n.customerId = 510014 OR n.customerId IS NULL)
  AND nr.readAt IS NULL;
